experiment_name: An artificial nickel chlorinase based on the biotin-streptavidin technology
additional_information: reaction_condition: reaction_temperature:25 °C;    reaction_ph:9.0;    reaction_other_conditions:50 µM [(BiotC4-bAQ)Ni] 1, 100 µM Sav FBS (1:2 ratio of cofactor to Sav FBS), 200 mM Ca(ClO)2, MeCN/phosphate buffer (2:3 ratio), 1 h reaction time;    reaction_substrate_concentration:20 mM
